amendment.description: Amendment sought to decrease funding for the Bureau of Land Management by $51.3 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the amount appropriated for Bureau of Land Management, Management of Lands and Resources, by $51,300,000, from $826,932,000 to $775,632,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment Failed by recorded vote: 85 - 337 (Roll no. 307).
